product_name: REI Duck's Back Rain Cover - 80 Liters
long_description: The 80-liter REI Duck's Back rain cover sports a waterproof polyurethane coating to shrug water off your pack like, well, a duck's back. Drawstring securely cinches around your pack for a snug fit. Reinforced bottom prevents damage when setting pack on rough surfaces.
short_description: The 80-liter REI Duck's Back rain cover sports a waterproof polyurethane coating to shrug water off your pack like, well, a duck's back.
keywords: rain cover,back pack cover,backpack cover,pack,pack cover
